description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 8th May 2024 (RN: 23/04885/FULL) for the Installation of air conditioning units within the rear lightwells; erection of an extract duct to roof level; air vents and the installation of a new window within the rear western lightwell; replacement of entrance step finishes to the front facade; refurbishment of the shopfront. NAMELY, to allow for design changes to the proposed plant installations and minor internal layout changes (Application under Section 73 of the Act)
